movies.title: Mörkret
movies.plot: A girl has committed suicide. More girls on a school in Skåne feel like doing the same. As Linda Wallander get the case shes more determined to solve this case than ever solving a case before, but feels more and more bad as she goes as she discovers that the girls on the school are being exploited and abused.
movies.simplePlot: A girl has committed suicide. More girls on a school in Skåne feel like doing the same. As Linda Wallander get the case shes more determined to solve this case than ever solving a case ...

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Johanna Sällström was born on December 30, 1974 in Stockholm, Sweden. In 1997 she won the award Guldbaggen for best female leading role in the movie Beneath the Surface (1997), which became her big breakthrough. Getting tired off all the interest around herself she moved to Denmark where she worked at a café shop, but in year 2000 she went back to Sweden and continued her acting career. She was best known for playing the police agent Linda Wallander in Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005). Even though Johanna Sällström often played tough on the screen, it is said she was much more shy and quiet in her private life. Sällström was found dead by the police at her home in Malmö, Sweden on 13th of February 2007.
biography.name: Johanna Sällström

biography.bio: Ola Rapace was born on December 3, 1971 in Tyresö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Pär Ola Norell. He is an actor and producer, known for Skyfall (2012), Beyond (2010) and Together (2000). He was previously married to Noomi Rapace.
biography.name: Ola Rapace

biography.bio: Angela Kovacs was born on May 23, 1964 in Vaksala, Uppland, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Irene Huss - Den krossade tanghästen (2008), Irene Huss (2007) and Irene Huss - Guldkalven (2008).
biography.name: Angela Kovacs

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Douglas Johansson was born on January 31, 1960. He is an actor, known for The Impossible (2012), Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005) and Arn: The Knight Templar (2007).
biography.name: Douglas Johansson

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Marianne Mörck was born on September 2, 1949 in Sweden. She is an actress and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Credo (1997) and Hon jazzade en sommar (2003).
biography.name: Marianne Mörck

biography.bio: Tomas Norström was born on May 23, 1956 in Södertälje, Stockholms län, Sweden as Stig Tomas Norström. He is an actor and writer, known for Kitchen stories - chroniques de cuisine (2003), A Cure for Wellness (2016) and The Hunters (1996).
biography.name: Tomas Norström

biography.bio: Stefan Gödicke was born on January 20, 1970 as Stefan Ingemar Gödicke. He is an actor, known for Second Avenue (2007), Mr. Ove (2015) and Simon & the Oaks (2011).
biography.name: Stefan Gödicke

biography.bio: Baard Owe was born on July 3, 1936 in Mosjøen, Norway as Baard Arne Owe. He is an actor and director, known for O'Horten (2007), Headhunters (2011) and Gertrud (1964). He is married to Marie-Louise Coninck. They have four children.
biography.name: Baard Owe

biography.bio: Per Morberg was born on June 23, 1960 in Stockholm, Sweden. He is an actor, known for As It Is in Heaven (2004), Zingo (1998) and Bip Bop Bip Bop Bap (2006).
biography.name: Per Morberg

biography.bio: Kajsa Ernst worked at Nöjesteatern in Malmo and with the infamous Nils Poppe at the Fredriksdals theatre in Helsingborg (both in Sweden) before she became a regular at Helsingborg City Theatre in the end of the 1980s. She stayed with the Helsingborg City Theatre for ten years and did a number of prominent roles there. Kajsa Ernst now lives in Stockholm and can be seen both at the Stockholm City Theatre in the play "Pepparrotslandet" and as the anxious Pauline in the Guldbagge awarded movie "Tomten är far till alla barnen". In autumn 1999 Kajsa Ernst did a role in the much noted TV-series "One Day At A Time" in an episode about anxiety attacks.
biography.name: Kajsa Ernst

biography.bio: Moraea Myrgren-Johansson is an actress, known for Capricciosa (2003) and Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Moraea Myrgren-Johansson

biography.bio: Natalie Minnevik was born on July 13, 1991 in Huddinge, Stockholms län, Sweden as Natalie Alexandra Minnevik. She is an actress, known for Elina: As If I Wasn't There (2002), The Circle - Chapitre 1: Les élues (2015) and Real Humans (2012).
biography.name: Natalie Minnevik
